group_1.narration: As soon as the Christmas decorations come@down, the end of the year bears down fast.
There is, however, a sweet Magical Girl@who continues to support the others@in Kamihama regardless, with@the same vigor every day.

group_1.textLeft: (I can see it... It's clear now.)
(Kokoro is having a lot of fun lately!)
(I wish I could too...)

group_1.narration: I am Mitama Yakumo.@I'm the kind Coordinator to all these@Magical Girls! Like a big sister!♪@...With no particular plans for New Year's.

group_1.textLeft: Okay! You're all set now.

group_1.textRight: Thank you, Mitama!

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*

group_1.textRight: You look like you've been working really@hard...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, are you worried about little old me?

group_1.textRight: Yes! Of course I am!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Thank you for your concern. [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]I@promise I'm fine, though.
Lots of people have been dropping by to@say hi before the end of the year.
So I'm just a little teensy bit busier than@usual. That's all.

group_1.textRight: Even so, you seem like you're having a rough@time.
Are you finished?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yeah! Sorry I kept you waiting out there@Masara.
Ah...
(Masara... That's right.)
(She was in one of Kokoro's memories that@I just saw.)
(And in it...)
Ski clothes...

group_1.textRight: Hm?
Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: (Oh goodness! That just slipped right out.)
Sorry, sorry.
I caught a little glance of something in@your Soul Gem, and I was curious about it.

group_1.textRight: Ski clothes...
Oh! Was it a memory from when I went@shopping with you, Masara?

group_1.textLeft: I suppose so.
Does that mean the two of you will be off@to hit the slopes soon?
[chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ooh, that sounds like a romantic adventure♪

group_1.textRight: No it doesn't.
We just thought it might be fun to do@something fitting for winter vacation.

group_1.textLeft: So you're going skiing?

group_1.textRight: Right!

group_1.textLeft: Kokoro really loves mountains.

group_1.textRight: Ha ha ha, you got me there.
Thanks for always coming along with me,@Masara.

group_1.textLeft: I don't mind... So long as you're happy.
Indeed!
You should have a whole bunch of exciting@experiences while you're still young.
You can bounce back from anything at that@age!

group_1.textRight: Are you doing anything for vacation, Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: Me? Ah...well...
I know I was the one who brought it up,@but I don't actually have any plans yet.

group_1.textRight: Huh?!
Then...would you like to come along with@us?
The mountains are really cold in winter, but@it'll definitely be a load of fun!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, no, I think I'll pass this time. But you@two have fun for me♪

group_1.textRight: Ohhh...
[chara:301601:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]It's too bad you don't want to come, but I @respect your choice.

group_1.textCenter: (I always go to the shrine with my family,@but I haven't made any other plans.)
(Seeing them does make me a tiny, teeny@bit jealous.)

group_1.narration: I am Mitama Yakumo.@I have no particular plans for New Year's.
But this year...@I'm going to try something new!
